features.name: Amazon S3 Folder Provider Configuration
features.description: Configure and manage Amazon S3 buckets as folder storage locations for storing files in AWS cloud storage
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Add Folder > Amazon S3 Folder Type
test_scenarios: Configure new S3 folder with valid AWS credentials
Create new S3 bucket through settings interface
Select existing S3 bucket from dropdown
Validate AWS access key and secret key
Test HTTP vs HTTPS protocol selection

features.name: UNC Folder Provider Configuration
features.description: Configure network shared folders (UNC paths) as folder storage locations for accessing files on network drives
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Add Folder > UNC Folder Type
test_scenarios: Configure UNC path with valid network location
Validate UNC path format and accessibility
Verify path encryption and secure storage
Configure folder with invalid UNC path
Test folder creation with special characters in path
Validate error handling for inaccessible paths

features.name: S3 File Operations
features.description: Perform file operations (upload, download, delete, move, rename) on files stored in Amazon S3 buckets
test_scenarios: Test file operations with special characters in names

features.name: UNC File Operations
features.description: Perform file operations on files stored in UNC network paths
test_scenarios: Test file operations with permission restrictions

features.name: S3 Direct Link Generation
features.description: Generate pre-signed URLs for direct access to S3 files without going through the application
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > [S3 Folder] > File Properties
test_scenarios: Generate direct link for public file
Generate pre-signed URL for private file
Test link generation with HTTPS protocol
Test link generation with HTTP protocol
Test access with expired pre-signed URL

features.name: Folder Synchronization
features.description: Synchronize folder contents between local storage and remote providers (S3, UNC)
test_scenarios: Synchronize S3 folder with local changes
Synchronize UNC folder with local changes
Handle sync conflicts (file exists in both)
Sync folder with deleted remote files
Sync folder with new remote files
Test sync with large number of files

features.name: Provider Icon Customization
features.description: Display custom icons for different folder provider types in the file manager tree
test_scenarios: Verify S3 folder displays Amazon icon
Verify UNC folder displays network icon
Test icon display in folder tree view
Test icon display in folder list view

features.name: S3 Bucket Management
features.description: Create and manage S3 buckets directly from the folder provider settings
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Add Folder > Amazon S3 > Settings
test_scenarios: Create new S3 bucket with valid name
Create bucket with invalid name format
Test bucket creation in different regions

features.name: Folder Provider Security
features.description: Manage security settings and access control for folder providers
test_scenarios: Test folder access with different user roles

features.name: Provider Cache Management
features.description: Manage caching of remote file listings to improve performance
test_scenarios: Test object list caching for S3
Verify cache invalidation on file changes
Test cache behavior with large file lists

features.name: Path Handling and Conversion
features.description: Handle path format conversions between different storage systems
test_scenarios: Convert UNC paths to relative paths
Test path repair for invalid separators

features.name: Provider Installation and Configuration
features.description: Install and configure folder providers through the extension installer
